mapper.select: SELECT aid FROM ego_user_address WHERE uid = #{uid} AND is_default = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ego_user_address(uid,receiver, province, city, county, address, phone, postcode) VALUES (#{uid},#{receiver},#{province},#{city},#{county},#{address},#{phone},#{postcode})
mapper.update: UPDATE ego_user_address SET receiver = #{receiver},province = #{province},city = #{city},county = #{county},address = #{address},phone = #{phone},postcode = #{postcode} WHERE aid = #{aid}
UPDATE ego_user_address SET ego_user_address.is_default = 0 WHERE ego_user_address.uid = #{uid}
